titles.title: You are my hiding place - Ps Rajan

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are my hiding place
You always fill my heart with songs
Of deliverance whenever I am afraid

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will trust in You
I will trust in You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let the weak say I am strong
In the strength of the Lord.
